org.daisy.pipeline.tts.rest

Class Request<ContentType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.tts.rest.Request<ContentType>

  • public class Request<ContentType>
extends Object
    REST Request to communicate with remote services (mainly tts services like Google and Amazon).
    Author:
    Nicolas Pavie @ braillenet.org

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Request(String httpMethod, String url, HashMap<String,String> headers, ContentType content)
      Fully initialized request

    • Constructor Detail

      • Request

        public Request(String httpMethod,
               String url,
               HashMap<String,String> headers,
               ContentType content)
        throws Exception,
               MalformedURLException
        Fully initialized request
        Parameters:
        httpMethod - possible values: "GET", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE", "HEAD", "CONNECT", "OPTIONS", "TRACE", "PATCH"
        url - a string of the complete request URL (including URL parameters like "?voice=smtg)"
        headers - HTTP headers of the request

        Use null to unset all headers.

        content - content to send with the request (often associated with POST requests)

        Use null for requests without content

        Throws:
        Exception - if the http method is not one of the list above
        MalformedURLException - if the url is not valid

    • Method Detail

      • addHeader

        public void addHeader(String name,
                      String value)
        Add a new header field with specified value to the request
        Parameters:
        name - name of the header field
        value - value set for the field

      • setContent

        public void setContent(ContentType content)
        Set the request content, to be sent through the request connection output stream
        Parameters:
        content - content of the request

      • setRequestUrl

        public void setRequestUrl(String url)
                   throws MalformedURLException
        Set the request URL.

        If a previous connection was opened for the current request, close and destroy it.

        Throws:
        MalformedURLException

      • setMethod

        public void setMethod(String httpMethod)
               throws Exception
        Set the HTTP method to use with the request
        Parameters:
        httpMethod - one of the following values: "GET", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE", "HEAD", "CONNECT", "OPTIONS", "TRACE", "PATCH"
        Throws:
        Exception - if the HTTP method value is not a valid one

      • send

        public InputStream send()
                 throws IOException,
                        InterruptedException
        Send the request to the requested url and retrieve the server answer as an input stream.
        Returns:
        the input stream, through which data are send back by the server
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occured during the connection or while sending data to the server
        InterruptedException - if the current thead is interrupted while getting the response from the server

      • getConnection

        public HttpURLConnection getConnection()
        Get the current connection object

      • cancel

        public void cancel()
        Cancel the request, disconnecting it from the server
